title: The Perimeter security market is projected to grow from USD 61.3 billion in 2020 to USD 96.5 billion by 2026, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 7.9%
The global immunofluorescence assays market is projected to reach USD 3.5 billion by 2026 from USD 2.6 billion in 2021, at a CAGR of 6.0%
